column4: hi folks, how do I display in command-line the differences between : /etc/kismet/kismet.conf_old /  and etc/kismet/kismet.conf ?
btw I cannot join #ubunt-fr ... is ther somenthing wrong with that server ?
sudo does not work, should i go 'sudo su' ?
you don't need sudo su, just su, that'd be like root doing su.
